name: Initial Remote Technical Inspection
description: Initial remote assessment following alarm trigger to determine inspection route

tasks.title: SAFETY CHECK: Initial visual assessment
tasks.description:
Perform rapid safety assessment to identify any immediate threats or damage.

Check for obvious structural damage, fire, smoke, or environmental hazards.
Verify drone is secured in hangar.
Assess if area is safe for crew dispatch.
instructions: Verify all camera feeds are operational
Check for visible threats or hazards

tasks.title: ALARM SECTOR: Inspect area that triggered alarm
tasks.description:
Focus inspection on the specific sector or area that triggered the alarm.

Identify any visible intrusion signs, damage, or anomalies in the alarm area.

tasks.title: DRONE STATUS: Quick visual assessment
tasks.description:
Rapid assessment of drone's general condition after landing.

Check for obvious damage to body, propellers, or critical components.
Verify landing gear status and positioning.

tasks.title: PARACHUTE: Verify deployment status
tasks.description: Quick check to ensure parachute system has not deployed and is secure.
instructions: Check for any parachute fabric visible

tasks.title: BATTERY: Visual status check
tasks.description: Check battery indicators and connections visible through cameras.

tasks.title: ROUTE DECISION: Recommend inspection path
tasks.description:
Based on initial findings, recommend whether Service Partner inspection or Onsite TI is required.

Service Partner: No critical issues found, standard remote inspection sufficient.
Onsite TI: Physical inspection required due to findings or limitations.
